description:
This application enables you to search the NLM Pubmed database with your webOS device. Searching can be done by a simple search or with the use of Filters. The search results are displayed as a list and tapping on any list item will give you a detailed view of the article, including the abstract if available. 
You can copy the search result to Clipboard, or forward it via email.
(The PubmedPlus version has additional save to Instapaper features, Local saved searches and also the ability to change the Article search limit) Pubmedlite is available freeware for personal use and is a means to evaluate the core features of this mobile Pubmed app before you make the decision to purchase the full version (and gain not only the additional cool features but my gratitude for your support which will spur me to create more medical webOS apps).** Please note that this application requires an Internet connection, and may be affected by any downtime of the Pubmed or EntrezAjax servers which this app uses. **
